data.name: Damage Inc F4U-4 "Reaper" Corsair
data.detailed_description: Featuring an even more powerful engine, this Corsair also trades its machine gun armaments for four 20mm cannons.
data.about_the_game: Featuring an even more powerful engine, this Corsair also trades its machine gun armaments for four 20mm cannons.
data.short_description: Featuring an even more powerful engine, this Corsair also trades its machine gun armaments for four 20mm cannons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows XP (SP2)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon X2 4000+
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 7800 or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro, 256MB, Shader Model 3.0+ Graphics Card
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
